parametrized_description: An international shipping company uses large ships and small ships to transport containers. A large ship can carry LargeShipCapacity containers while a small ship can carry SmallShipCapacity containers. The number of large ships cannot exceed the number of small ships. The company needs to transport at least RequiredContainers containers. Find the minimum number of ships that can be used.

LargeShipCapacity.description: Number of containers a large ship can carry

SmallShipCapacity.description: Number of containers a small ship can carry

RequiredContainers.description: Minimum number of containers to transport

constraints.description: The number of large ships does not exceed the number of small ships.
The total number of containers transported by large and small ships is at least RequiredContainers.

objective.description: Minimize the total number of ships used, which is the sum of large ships and small ships.
